mapper.sql: id, operationDate, billingDate, firm, topUpAmount, cashReceipts, paymentAccount, contact, note, deleted, company, firmType
mapper.insert:
insert into top_up_amount
id,
operationDate,
billingDate,
firm,
topUpAmount,
cashReceipts,
paymentAccount,
contact,
note,
deleted,
company,
firmType,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{topupamount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cashreceipts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paymentaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update top_up_amount
operationDate = #{operationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
billingDate = #{billingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topUpAmount = #{topupamount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cashReceipts = #{cashreceipts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paymentAccount = #{paymentaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
firmType = #{firmtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update top_up_amount set operationDate = #{operationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, billingDate = #{billingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firm = #{firm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topUpAmount = #{topupamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cashReceipts = #{cashreceipts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paymentAccount = #{paymentaccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firmType = #{firmtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update top_up_amount set modifyTime = #{registrationTime}, firm = #{firm}, billingDate = #{billingDate}, topUpAmount = #{topUpAmount}, cashReceipts = #{cashReceipts}, paymentAccount = #{paymentAccount}, contact = #{contact}, note = #{note}, firmType = #{firmType}, operationDate = #{otimestamps} where id = #{id} and deleted = '0'
update top_up_amount set deleted = '1',modifyTime = #{registrationTime} where id = #{id}
update top_up_amount set deleted = '1',modifyTime = #{registrationTime} where operationDate = #{otimestamps} and company = #{company} and firmType = #{firmtype}
mapper.select: select count(id) from top_up_amount where deleted='0' and company = #{company} and firmType =#{firmType}

select id,operationDate,billingDate,firm,topUpAmount,cashReceipts,paymentAccount,contact,note,firmType from top_up_amount where firmType =#{firmType} and company = #{company} and deleted = '0' order by operationDate desc limit #{page},#{pagesize}
select sum(topUpAmount) from top_up_amount where deleted='0' and company = #{company} and firm = #{sourceName} and billingDate = #{date}
select sum(topUpAmount) from top_up_amount where deleted='0' and company = #{company} and firm = #{sourceName} and billingDate >=#{startDate} and billingDate <#{endDate}
